Cardboard box can be used as a DIY pet bed or scratching post. Simply cover the box with a soft material and add some toys or treats for your pet to chew on.
Cardboard box can be used as a portable storage container for moving or organizing. Simply stack several boxes together and secure them with rope or tape.
Cardboard box can be used as a makeshift fort or playhouse for children. Simply cut out windows and doors and paint the box to make it look like a real house.
Cardboard box can be used as a platform for a miniature garden. Simply poke drainage holes in the bottom of the box and fill it with soil and plants.
Cardboard box can be used as a DIY birdhouse. Simply cut out a few holes in the box and paint it with bright colors to attract birds.
